CustomFieldTranslation.name: Affl_ProgEnroll_Copy_End_Date__c
CustomFieldTranslation.help: Indicates whether to set the End Date of the Affiliation created with a Program Enrolment. If enabled, set the End Date to the Program Enrolment's End Date. If disabled, don't specify the Affiliation's End Date.
CustomFieldTranslation.label: Affil End Date Copy from Prog Enrol
